title: How to Make a Halo 3 Montage

steps.headline: Save all of the film clips you have of No scopes, sticks, sprees, and multi kills, 4 shots, or just other insane kills that don't happen a lot onto your Xbox.
steps.description: Even good righteous teabags will work. Try to wait until you pull off some clutch multi kills and sticks.

steps.headline: Try to use film clips from the Social slayer, Social big teams, and MLG.
steps.description: Don't Use clips where people aren't playing or are just standing still. Avoid shotgun kills, swords and Assault Rifles. BRs are good as is the sniper and rockets.

steps.headline: Use a capture card, a good cheap one is pinnacle dazzle platinum ($89.99), and play all your clips and film them.
Upload the video and effects such as slow motion replays and such and edit it so it flows smoothly.
You really need music in your video.

Become a member of Bungie.net and advertising that you have made a montage and get a lot of people to watch it and get the halo community to tell you what you can do to get better or to make a cooler montage.

text: Save all of the film clips you have of No scopes, sticks, sprees, and multi kills, 4 shots, or just other insane kills that don't happen a lot onto your Xbox. Even good righteous teabags will work. Try to wait until you pull off some clutch multi kills and sticks. Try to use film clips from the Social slayer, Social big teams, and MLG. Don't Use clips where people aren't playing or are just standing still. Avoid shotgun kills, swords and Assault Rifles. BRs are good as is the sniper and rockets. Use a capture card, a good cheap one is pinnacle dazzle platinum ($89.99), and play all your clips and film them.  Upload the video and effects such as slow motion replays and such and edit it so it flows smoothly.  You really need music in your video. Linkin' Park flows with montages. Post it on YouTube.
